required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Clary Sage Essential Oil Inhalation and Third Trimester Quality of Life: A Randomized, Double Blind, Controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Franklin School of Integrative Health Sciences

clinical_study.source: Franklin School of Integrative Health Sciences

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the potential for clary sage essential oil to support overall health, wellbeing, and quality of life during the third trimester of pregnancy among otherwise healthy adult women.

detailed_description.textblock:
Women will be informed of the opportunity to participate through their care providers, childbirth educators, or doulas. If they meet inclusion criteria, they will be given a brochure describing the risks and benefits of the study and the informed consent paperwork.
If they provide consent, they will be randomized to one of two groups: active essential oil and inert placebo. Both groups will receive a 4-ounce bottle of oil to apply daily during the third trimester of pregnancy. Those in the placebo group will be given an inert plant oil. Those in the intervention group will be given the same oil with the addition of clary sage essential oil.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in salivary estriol levels from pregnancy week 27 to pregnancy week 36.
primary_outcome.description: salivary estriol levels are collected via the passive drool method and laboratory analyzed

primary_outcome.measure: Change in quality of life from week 27 to 36 of the pregnancy using the World Health Organization's Quality of Life, Brief-Form Scale (WHOQOL-BREF).
primary_outcome.description: This one survey measures overall quality of life through. It contains 26 questions across 4 domains. Questions are scored on a 1-5 likert scale with higher scores indicating higher quality of life.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from enrollment to birth, up to 16 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: The total length of the pregnancy (in days) from last menstrual period to birth.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the onset of labor to birth, up to 24 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The total length of phase 2 of labor (in minutes)

arm_group.description: Participants in this group will receive a fragrant plant based massage oil with the addition of clary sage essential oil. The massage oil will be massaged into the upper thighs daily for the duration of the third trimester.
Participants in this group will receive a fragrant plant based massage oil. The massage oil will be massaged into the upper thighs daily for the duration of the third trimester.

intervention.description: This massage oil contains clary sage oil. Five drops will be used daily.
This massage oil consists entirely of plant based oils. Five drops will be used daily.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 20-39
- Lives in the United States
- Pregnant, singleton
- Low risk
- Less than 27 weeks gestation
Exclusion Criteria:
- PCOS diagnosis
- Uncontrolled Hypertension (i.e. systolic/diastolic blood pressure > 140/90)
- Gestational Diabetes
- History of Preeclampsia
- Preterm labor
- Incompetent cervix
- Allergy to salvia sclarea or related plants
- Known Birth Defects
- Thyroid Disease diagnosis
